auxiliary.services module¶

class auxiliary.services.Services¶

Bases: lib.cuckoo.common.abstracts.Auxiliary

Allows one or more additional VMs to be run next to an analysis. Either as global services (which are generally never rebooted) or on a per-analysis basis.

start()¶
start_service(service)¶

Start a VM containing one or more services.

stop()¶
stop_service(task_id)¶

Stop a VM containing one or more services.
